pages.cookies: Cookies Policy | Protection of your personal data Home About HOW TO PLAY FAQ'S DOWNLOAD APP StaminaX Cookies Policy At StaminaX, safeguarding your privacy and ensuring your security is paramount. Our Cookies Policy outlines the use of cookies on our platform to enrich your user experience and deliver personalized content. By continuing to utilize our app, you agree to the utilization of cookies as delineated in this policy. What are cookies? Cookies are tiny text files stored on your device when you visit a website or utilize an app. They gather data on your browsing habits and preferences, aiding the website or app in offering a tailored user experience. How we use cookies: To retain your preferences and settings, like language preferences and login details. To monitor your interactions with our platform, including visited pages and utilized features. To analyze user behavior and enhance our app's performance and functionality. To furnish personalized content and recommendations based on your interests and activities on the app. Types of cookies we use: We employ both session cookies (temporary, deleted upon closing the app) and persistent cookies (stored on your device for an extended period). We also use first-party cookies (set by StaminaX) and third-party cookies (set by external service providers). Your cookie preferences: You have the option to accept or decline cookies on StaminaX by adjusting your browser or device settings. However, please be aware that disabling cookies may impact the functionality and performance of our app. Changes to this policy: We may periodically update this Cookies Policy to reflect alterations in our practices or legal requirements. We encourage regular review of this policy to stay informed about our cookie usage. For any inquiries or concerns regarding our cookie usage, please contact us at staminax@gmail.com. Thank you for choosing StaminaX! pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy | Protection of your personal data Home About HOW TO PLAY FAQ'S DOWNLOAD APP Privacy Policy for StaminaX Welcome to StaminaX! Safeguarding your privacy is our utmost concern, and this Privacy Policy delineates our procedures for gathering, utilizing, and protecting your personal information. 1. Data Collection: - At StaminaX, we collect various personal details, such as your name, email address, and phone number, when you engage with our services, such as enrolling in classes or subscribing to updates. - Additionally, we automatically gather non-personal data like IP addresses, browser types, and device identifiers to enhance the functionality and user experience of our website. 2. Use of Data: - Your personal data is primarily utilized for processing enrollments, providing support, and sharing updates about our programs and offerings. - Non-personal data is employed for analytical purposes, such as monitoring website traffic patterns and refining our outreach strategies. 3. Data Sharing: - We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. However, we may share your data with trusted partners and service providers who assist us in delivering our services and improving customer experience. 4. Data Security: - StaminaX implements industry-standard security measures to safeguard your personal data from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. 5. Your Choices: - You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal data stored in our systems. Additionally, you may opt out of receiving marketing communications from us at any time. 6. Policy Updates: - We reserve the right to amend or revise this Privacy Policy as necessary. Any modifications will be promptly communicated to you through our website or other appropriate channels. If you have any questions or concerns regarding our Privacy Policy, please don't hesitate to contact us at staminax@gmail.com. Thank you for entrusting StaminaX with your privacy and choosing us to be your artistic haven!
